body: I love their relationship. They both need each other. You could legit make a full story about this. Have an arc where he takes her for granted and realizes how amazing she was, and then she moves on and find a guy that "treats her right" only to realize that he's only doing it for public image and doesn't value her. And then they get back together, make hot, steamy love, and then get married.
Had us in the first half ngl
Why there are so many lolicon doujin today lol
